title: Full Size 1200 Thread-Count Siberian Goose Down Comforter, 100% Egyptian Cotton, White Stripe & 50Oz
features: Luxury down comforter provides medium warmth for year-round comfort
Size 90 x 90 inches, RDS Certified and filled with ethically sourced, down filling certified to the Responsible Down Standard (RDS), OEKO-TEX Standard 100 and BSCI.
Box-stitching design to avoid any shifting in your comforter
Brand New & Factory Sealed in a Beautiful Zippered Gift Package
description: Package contains 1 Luxurious all year Down Comforter in a beautiful zippered package. Wrap yourself in these 100% Egyptian Cotton Superior comforters that are truly worthy of a classy elegant suite, and are found in world class hotels. Woven to a luxurious high threads per square inch,these fine Luxury Bed Duvets are crafted from Long Staple Giza Cotton grown in the lush Nile River Valley since the time of the Pharaohs. Comfort, quality and opulence set our Luxury Bedding in a class above the rest. The result is a comforter so luxurious and soft, you will believe you are truly covering with a cloud, night after night. You will relax and enjoy the rich, soft and luxurious feeling of cotton cover comforter.
